Hi,

>          Can I test get and set functions which contain simple
> operations? Like,
Yes, why not? What is the problem?

>           What are the other method to test these kind of functions I am
> using only assertEqual() to test these kind of function.
Depending on what exactly you want to test, assertNotNull may be useful.
 
>          Is any other way is available with junit to test these kind of
> functions?
What other way are you thinking of?
Or what problems do you have with the "assertEquals-way"?

Robert


PS: Please fix your mail client. 
It sends with too high priority and seems to add too much white space.
It seems to attach pictures.
Your signature is way too long and does not start with '-- '.
In combination with your email address ending in numbers and no real name
that may make spam filters consider your email spam. (Mine did.)
